title: Hassan S. (Verified ZocDoc User)'s Review of Dr. Ann Glasman - MD (5/5) on ZocDoc
text: Internist Professional Statement With over 20 years of experience in the medical field, Dr. Ann A. Glasman is committed to providing unique care to each of her patients. Dr.Glasman is board certified in Internal Medicine and Echocardiography. During her studies at Carney Hospital in Dorchester, MA, Dr. Glasman held the prestigious role of Chief Resident. When it comes to patient care, she holds a particular interest in the prevention and management of cardiovascular disease, adult onset diabetes, weight loss, and urinary incontinence. Dr. Glasman is also deeply connected to women's health needs. Dr. Glasman looks forward to connecting with patients to provide specific health solutions to help increase the quality of a their daily lives. Zocdoc Awards
